Water quality calculation

Source: R/wq_calc.R
wq_calc.Rd

Calculates a set of water quality indices

wq_calc(raster_stack, alg = "all", sat, ...)

Arguments

raster_stack

RasterStack containing a satellite data
alg

Name (e.g. Am09KBBI()) or type of the algorithm ("chlorophyll", "phycocyanin", "turbidity") or "all"
sat

Name of the satellite or instrument ("worldview2", "sentinel2", "landsat8", "modis", "meris", or "OLCI")
...

Other arguments passed on to stack()

Value

RasterLayer

Examples

library(raster)
#> Loading required package: sp

# sentinel2 example
s2 = stack(system.file("raster/S2_Harsha.tif", package = "waterquality"))
s2_Al10SABI = wq_calc(s2, alg = "Al10SABI", sat = "sentinel2")
#> Al10SABI calculated!
s2_two_alg = wq_calc(s2, alg = c("TurbChip09NIROverGreen", "Am092Bsub"), sat = "sentinel2")
#> Am092Bsub calculated!
#> TurbChip09NIROverGreen calculated!


# NOT RUN {
(
s2_wq = wq_calc(s2, alg = "all", sat = "sentinel2")

# landsat8 example
l8 = stack(system.file("raster/L8_Taylorsville.tif", package = "waterquality"))
l8_wq = wq_calc(s2, alg = "all", sat = "landsat8")
)
# }
